channel.title: Academia on Luke M Perez
channel.description: Recent content in Academia on Luke M Perez

item.title: Letterhead Template for Pandoc
item.description: This is not a workflow post. I don’t normally post about process or things related to my workflow because, having tried in the past, have concluded that it is more of a procrastination tactic than anything else. Even my post about switching to Hugo for webhosting was written for me rather than anyone else. You don’t care about my workflow. You have your own. You don’t need to know how I produce what I do.

item.title: APSA 2017, Job Market Edition
item.description: Heading to ‘Frisco for APSA this week.1 Not much planned save for flurry of job market interviews and meetings with old colleagues, advisors, and friends. To be sure, I planned this trip not without some degree of trepidation. It’s a lot of money to plan for a conference and since I’m not presenting, I am ineligible for reimbursement within my department. Of course, I suspect this job market project is similar to nearly any field: new suit, flights, hotels, etc.
